title: Evolution: The Grand Experiment - Dr. Carl Werner
description:

For over 30 years, Dr. Carl Werner was involved in a personal journey, searching for the truth. He traveled the globeÃ¢â‚¬â€visiting dig sites and museums, conducting interviews with leading experts, and moreÃ¢â‚¬â€all to answer a simple question: Ã¢â‚¬Å“Can you prove evolution?Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ His discovery, presented in a unique and compelling format, takes you through both sides of the issue, and then reveals the remarkable and unmistakable truth. -Understand the scientific principles behind the modern-day idea of evolution.

About the author:
Dr Carl Werner is the Executive Producer of Evolution: The Grand Experiment video series and author of Evolution: The Grand Experiment book series and curriculum. He received his undergraduate degree in Biology, with distinction, at the University of Missouri, graduating summa cum laude. He received his doctorate degree in Medicine at the age 23.
